d:
With the Resistance Camp subjugated by the Empire’s new brainwashing magiteks, will our young heroes escape the grim fate of becoming slave drones?

Meahwhile a party is being thrown at Rhalgr's Reach to welcome the arrival of new Eorzean allies, the insidious seeds of the Black Rose Project also begin to take root in the heart of the Resistance.

Notes:
Apologies again for the delay. I’ve already begun working on the next chapter, but with the Lunar New Year vacation approaching, I may need a little more time to finish it.

I also debated whether or not to change Alisaie’s hairstyle in certain scenes in this chapter. In the end, I decided to go with the change. I do hope we’ll one day see an official version of Alisaie with her hair down, though.

Finally, thank you again for all your support and appreciation! Wishing you all a happy Lunar New Year!
n: [Game CG] Black Rose Doll Part VI (2/2)
